segments.text: Have you obtained any certificate of technical qualifications or license ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I have received an Engineer's Qualification Certificate and a driver's license .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How many years have you had the driver's license ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have two years driving experience .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's good . What special skills do you have , can you tell me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have experience in computer operation , proficiency in Microsoft Windows , Microsoft Word and Microsoft Excel .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What computer languages have you learned ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you gotten any special training in programming ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , but I have database programming experience and network knowledge .
segments.speaker: S2
